## Lesson goals and objectives

### Learning goals

<!--
High-level "big picture" objectives of the learning process.
This should be no more than 3 bullet points.
-->

- Describe statistical distributions and tests available in <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i>.
- Explain the motivation for dimensionality reduction and clustering.
- Understand the relationship between dimensionality reduction and clustering.

### Learning objectives

<!--
More concrete and measurable outputs.
This can range from 3 to 8 bullet points.
-->

- Demonstrate the use of statistical distributions and tests available in <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i>.
- Apply principal component analysis.
- Visualise and interpret the outputs of principal component analysis.
- Apply hierarchical clustering.
- Visualise and interpret the outputs of hierarchical clustering.
